refnamediv.refpurpose: Explains usage of MicroDAQ blocks for code generation ans host simulation mode

refsection.title: MicroDAQ blocks
refsection.para: MicroDAQ toolbox for Scilab provides set of Xcos blocks which can be used for creating Xcos diagrams. After MicroDAQ toolbox for Scilab installation new block 'MicroDAQ' category appears in Xcos palete browser (View->Palette browser).

The 'MicroDAQ' category contains palettes which contains blocks provided by toolbox. MicroDAQ palette (MicroDAQ->MicroDAQ) contains MicroDAQ related blocks. These blocks give user access to MicroDAQ hardware peripherals, allows model configuration and reads model parameters and live DSP data from executed model on MicroDAQ DSP processor. Blocks are marked with blue and read label 'MicroDAQ' which indicates that block is from MicroDAQ palette. The 'SIGNAL' block which is not marked with label is a special block which allows reading live DSP data from running DSP executable.

simplelist.member: ADC, DAC - access to MicroDAQ analog input/outputs
DIO Config, DIO Set, DIO Get - access to MicroDAQ DIO (Digital Input/Outputs)
Encoder - read MicroDAQ quadrature encoder
Func key - read F1, F2 MicroDAQ function key
LED - sets MicroDAQ D1, D2 LEDs
MEM read, MEM write - access MicroDAQ memory, allow user to change DSP executable parameters on fly
PWM - sets MicroDAQ PWM
RC controller - access to MicroDAQ RC controller
SETUP - configure model parameters (duration, build type, model execution mode, solver)
SIGNAL - read data from model running on MicroDAQ DSP processor
PARAM - sets data to model running on MicroDAQ DSP processor
Sin - generate sine waveform
Square - generate square waveform
Step - generate step signal
STOP - end model execution
TCP recv, TCP send - access network data with TCP protocol (client mode)
Time - return current model execution time
To file - write data to file on MicroDAQ User Disk
UART config, UART read, UART write - access to MicroDAQ UART
UDP recv, UDP send - access network data with UDP protocol
